text: Ojo kofiron cuz daleli sidqi in va'daro (ja'ne, va'dahoe, ki dar Qur'on doda suda ʙudand), intizori dorand? Ruze, ki daleli sidqas padidor savad, kofirone, ki on ruzro az jod ʙurda ʙudand, megujand: « Hamono pajomʙaroni Parvardigori mo ʙa haq omadand. Pas ojo safo'atkunandagone hastand, ki moro safo'at kunand? Jo ʙozgardonida savem ʙa sui dunjo, pas amal kunem ƣajri on ci mekardem?» Hamono ʙa xud zijon rasondand va on ʙutonro, ki ʙa duruƣ soxta ʙudand, inak az dast dodaand
